resources.string:
When going through Gamle Stavanger, this app will show points of interest on the screen. These can be tapped to reveal information about them.

 Just open the app when in Gamle Stavanger, and look around using your device's camera to get started. 

 This application runs on Google Play Services for AR (ARCore), which is provided by Google LLC and governed by the Google Privacy Policy.
This application runs on Google Play Services for AR (ARCore), which is provided by Google LLC and governed by the Google Privacy Policy.
